sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter
Class TwitterConnection

java.lang.Object
  sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter.TwitterConnection

public class TwitterConnection
extends java.lang.Object

The TwitterConnection objects provides the api for connection to the Twitter API (http://apiwiki.twitter.com/) This class is dependent on the commons-httpclient (http://hc.apache.org/) provided by the Apache Software Foundation. Its dependencies include commons-codec and commons-logging.

Author:
Yipeng, Shawn , Low Wee and Breton

authenticate

public boolean authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
                     throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException,
                            java.io.IOException
Authenticates using the Twitter API with the given username and password.

Parameters:
username - The same username used at the Twitter login page can be used.
password - The same password used at the Twitter login page can be used.
Returns:
true if successfully authenticated. false if the wrong credentials are supplied.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown when there is a connection error.
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException

getMainListing

public java.util.List<sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter.SudokuTweet> getMainListing()
                                                                     throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException,
                                                                            java.io.IOException
Retrieves and processes Tweets from Twitter and returns a LinkedList of SudokuTweets with the latest tweet being the first element in the list. If the user is logged in, this method returns the tweets the user is mentioned in to the top of the list sorted by time posted.

Returns:
Throws:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException
java.io.IOException

getCachedMainListing

public java.util.List<sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter.SudokuTweet> getCachedMainListing()
Processes the cached Tweets previously retrieved from Twitter and returns a LinkedList of SudokuTweets

Returns:

getCachedTweets

public java.util.List<sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter.SudokuTweet> getCachedTweets()
Returns the cached Tweets previously retrieved from Twitter and returns a LinkedList of SudokuTweets

Returns:

getSearchResults

public java.util.LinkedList<sg.edu.nus.sudoku.twitter.SudokuTweet> getSearchResults(java.lang.String searchString)
                                                                             throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException,
                                                                                    java.io.IOException
This method retrieves search results via the Twitter API.

Parameters:
searchString - Text to search for
Returns:
LinkedList of SudokuTweets that were retrieved. The resulting SudokuTweets return null when getSudokuString if no puzzle string was included with the tweet.
Throws:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException - Thrown when a HttpException is caught.
java.io.IOException - Thrown when client is not connected to the internet or if twitter.com is unreachable.

isAuthenticated

public boolean isAuthenticated()
Returns true if the authenticate(String, String) method was successful. Does not check if client is connected to the Internet.

Returns:
true if authenticated.

shareSudoku

public void shareSudoku(java.lang.String message,
                        java.lang.String sudokuString)
                 throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException,
                        java.io.IOException
Shares a sudoku game in the format understood by other Twitdoku clients: "[message] #twitdoku [puzzle-string]"

Parameters:
message - Message to include with the tweet.
sudokuString - 81-character puzzle string
Throws:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException - Thrown when a HttpException is caught.
java.io.IOException - Thrown when client is not connected to the internet or if twitter.com is unreachable.

updateStatus

public void updateStatus(java.lang.String text)
                  throws org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException,
                         java.io.IOException
Shares a message on Twitter.

Parameters:
text - Message content
Throws:
org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpException - Thrown when a HttpException is caught.
java.io.IOException - Thrown when client is not connected to the internet or if twitter.com is unreachable.
